com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsontype.impl

类 TypeIdResolverBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsontype.impl.TypeIdResolverBase
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    TypeIdResolver
    直接已知子类:
    ClassNameIdResolver, TypeNameIdResolver

    public abstract class TypeIdResolverBase
extends Object
implements TypeIdResolver
    Partial base implementation of TypeIdResolver: all custom implementations are strongly recommended to extend this class, instead of directly implementing TypeIdResolver. Note that ALL sub-class need to re-implement typeFromId(DatabindContext, String) method; otherwise implementation will not work.

    Note that instances created to be constructed from annotations (JsonTypeIdResolver) are always created using no-arguments constructor; protected constructor is only used sub-classes.

      Common base type for all polymorphic instances handled.

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        public void init(JavaType bt)
        从接口复制的说明: TypeIdResolver
        Method that will be called once before any type resolution calls; used to initialize instance with configuration. This is necessary since instances may be created via reflection, without ability to call specific constructor to pass in configuration settings.
        指定者:
        init 在接口中 TypeIdResolver
        参数:
        bt - Base type for which this id resolver instance is used

      • idFromBaseType

        public String idFromBaseType()
        从接口复制的说明: TypeIdResolver
        Method that can be called to figure out type id to use for instances of base type (declared type of property). This is usually only used for fallback handling, for cases where real type information is not available for some reason.
        指定者:
        idFromBaseType 在接口中 TypeIdResolver

      • typeFromId

        public JavaType typeFromId(DatabindContext context,
                           String id)
                    throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: TypeIdResolver
        Method called to resolve type from given type identifier.
        指定者:
        typeFromId 在接口中 TypeIdResolver
        抛出:
